name: Betsy MM
text: Ordered some delivery, Blaze pizza... and loved this pizza!  Flavorful with a thin crust we really liked it.  The garlic knots were delish. Pizzas are 11 inch so if you are hungry, these could be considered single serving given the crust is not doughy.

name: T Vee
text: First time ordering based on a referral.   Notice the order time...the pizza was ready until 6:45 and arrive at 7:15.  Ordered the Veg Out pizza and it arrived burnt, dehydrated cheese/veggies and cold.  Horrible quality! Stay away. Two thumbs down!

name: Jeremy Brown
text: Good fresh pizza! The S’mores Desserts are great too. Employees are super nice!

name: Wyatt Rhino
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE! Best pizza I’ve had in a really long time. The workers are all so helpful! The quality of their ingredients is bar-none!

name: Jim A
text: Ordered pizza through the app and picked it up curbside. Both of my pizzas had no sauce on them. I tried contacting Blaze customer support twice and provided pictures of the sauce-less pizza and was told to "Ask for more toppings during my …More

name: Jonathan Robles
text: Every time I come to blaze I am always greeted with positive attitudes from the staff. The pizza is amazing!! Glad to refer friends and family to this location!

name: Paulette Velez
text: Liv was so friendly right when I walked in! She made sure to explain everything to me since it was my first time there.

name: Антонина Марьина
text:
Review based on our last two visits within 2 months.
This place became a garbage. Ordered pizza with pepperoni (probably medium size) still it was like 1,5 pepperoni pieces per slice. And they were out of cool …More

name: Kandie Miller
text: Pizza is my favorite food and Blaze is my favorite place!  The employees are welcoming and always make my pizza just how I like it.  I am your biggest cheerleader!

name: Ingrid Taylor
text: Staff is fun and friendly. Very fast service. Thanks guys

name: Andrea Mcarthur
text: I had the best experience with Liv. They provided amazing customer service and was very helpful when it came to customizing my pizza !

name: Maria JonesEXT
text: Love this pizza. Customer service is super nice. Olivia was on it for a perfect pizza.

name: Davey Lockheart
text: Came with my family and kids. I have young kids and they really enjoyed the pepperoni pizza and cheese pizzas.

name: Tori McLaughlin
text: The reason for the 4 stars is no outside seating so sadly we couldn’t enjoy and eat there, very good selection of crust we all were very pleased with how they were taking precautions and making sure to have a clean store we enjoyed some …More

name: H T
text: Matt's customer service at Blaze Otay Ranch was second to none.  It was my first time to Blaze and his helpfulness of menu choices made my experience painless.  The pizza recommendations were great!!  I'll be returning again.

name: Justin Santiago
text: Walked into blaze and it was very nice and clean. All the workers were wearing masks and gloves. Customer service was amazing! My pizza was ready very fast! Pizza was also great! Keep up the good work blaze!

name: Rob M
text: My pizza arrived with an uncooked crust and the toppings were ice cold. If I wanted a frozen pizza I would have gotten one from the frozen food section of the local grocery store

name: SJ C
text: Quality of product Insanely amazing IF you can handle the constant change in delivery times - that part is super lame. Once my order was taken and they had to remake it. Wheni get my pickup time, it always changes but about 30 mins.

name: Jesus Flores
text: Mathew and Priscilla made sure my pizza was delicious and just as I wanted it!

name: bridgette grace
text: liv made my experience enjoyable and easy i’ll definitely be back!!!

name: Harry Harlington
text: My kids brought me some home. It was cold by the time I ate it but still enjoyed the flavor of the sauce. I hope I can have it hot next time

name: Andrew Williams
text: I have to say this place is amazing! Great customer service! Pizza tasted like quality! Everybody was wearing masks! Eveything is clean! You don’t see franchises like blaze honestly! They are doing it right! Somone even came to my table and …More

name: Joe Valdez
text: First time coming to blaze and WOW! This place is really good. Fast and easy, not toooooooo pricy, great vibe, and everyone working was very helpful. Also you have to try there house drinks. I forgot what it was but it was really good. Thank you

name: Angela Adelmeyer
text: Very cheerful and polite staff, despite being extremely busy.  Pizza was amazing.

name: Nick K
text: Great place with various selections of crusts.  Love my keto crust.

text: Really good.  Crust was just right, all flavors fresh.  No greasy feeling!!!!

text: Liv was super friendly, would recommend to all my friends!!

text:

But now, every time we decide to have a delivery it's a nightmare.

name: Wupzie Chan
text: Liv was really helpful and was very friendly 5 stars :-)

text: Blaze Pizza in Otay Ranch area has a great location in that it is close to tons of shopping and other areas of interest.  Very easy to stop in for a bite to eat.  The restaurant has a good setup for customers to customize their own pizza …More

name: Lucas Webb
text: Loved the food excellent tasting pizza like nothing ive ever tasted before in my life. The service wasnt that good. They advertise curb side pick up so i asked and literaly every person who asked for curbside had to park get out walk in and get food on there own

text: Blaze pizza it's the best pizza on the south of CA , I love the pepperoni  gluten free Pizza.  delicious thank you Alexa for you excellent costumer service

text: Came to this blaze for a quick bite and was surprised by the quality of the food. Ill be coming back for sure.

text: A little pricey but it is still a novelty to be able tug o customize your pizza. It would be nice to have a larger option  for the mase to order pizzas.

text: Staff was friendly and food came out quickly. Went to Blaze because I heard they had vegan options and they did not disappoint.

name: catalina roji
text: My experience at Blaze was amazing!!! Great food and even better customer service. Nathalia helped me quickly and efficiently. 100% recommend!! I'll definitely be coming back.

name: Besty Rodriguez
text: LOVE this place! I go here every payday and get a high rise pizza. If you haven’t tried it, you should. The staff is excellent and always attentive. Best Blaze around. …More

name: Adrian Sosa
text: The pizza here was fantastic! Very friendly workers too, the worker Olivia was very friendly towards me when taking my order and very patient, will be going back.

name: Chris Aveo
text: This was my first time here and I absolutely loved it! I ordered the White Top pizza and added a few more toppings to my liking. Get some spicy red sauce on the side for some dipping action!! I will definitely be back for more!!

name: lalila keener
text: Delicious! The crust is crispy and light. Will definitely return...and thank you for protecting the environment!

name: Jerry
text: Way better than project pie! Friendly staff and the pizza is excellent! Make sure to get the "build your own" and pick unlimited toppings!

name: Nathalia Solano
text: To be honest, it’s the best pizza out there, it is healthy and all the ingredients look so fresh. Everybody was friendly and service was fast. This place deserves 6 stars it is so delicious! It was a little bit cold but that’s okay because the food was worth it.

name: Irma Avalos
text: I loved Blaze !! Having the opportunity to select your ingredients is perfect! They made the pizza as I wanted it. With very fresh and good quality ingredients, they created for me a different and delicious pizza! And they have the best urugula salad I've ever had !!

text: I absolutely love Blaze Pizza because of the welcoming atmosphere and the amazing design in being able to create your own pizza. The food is outstanding, the prices are very affordable, and the selection on toppings to crust is incredible. I will definitely be returning in the future

text: Tried the keto crust for the first time and it was surprisingly delicious and filling! Only ate half too (shared the other half with the wifey). Definitely recommend for those looking for a low carb option. Crust wasn't super crispy like regular dough pizza, but definitely appetizing enough to satisfy my pizza craving! 🍕 🍕
